commit message: made 3G with an uppercase G

Merge pull request #8 from Krylez/master

Fix for issue #7 (Display '4:00' instead of '04:00')

updated before/after

Add more colors (from http://developer.android.com/design/style/color.html).
Split user defined colors and default colors.
Ordered color list (user defined colors first).

Simplify the 'Add new colour' dialog
Colours are validated by Color.parseColor(String) and therefore more flexible

Delete user defined colours

Merge pull request #11 from SimonMarquis/feature-more-colors

More colours :sp
fixes #10. Added option for using 24hr format
set a message on alertdialog for deleting colours, tweaked strings
improve design time apperance in AS, set clock padding to 6 to be more accurate
bumped gradle to 0.13/2.1
corrected kitkat colours - white when gradient on, else white/grey
use 9 patch from android source for kitkat gradient, set with padding to show correctly

Simplified some of the changes made to colours in PR #11. Default colours are set in colourprefs if there's nothing saved, otherwise behave as any other user added colour as there were some issues - users could not delete default colours, app was crashing when trying to delete default colour, were also duplicates of black/white when upgrading from older version. Also slightly improved dialog to only enable the add button when both name and valid colour have been set
added translations for enUS for other strings
version to 1.0.5
